Package MobilePlan.entities

Class PrePaidCard

  • java.lang.Object
    • MobilePlan.entities.MobilePhoneContract
      • MobilePlan.entities.PrePaidCard
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Comparable<MobilePhoneContract>
    public class PrePaidCard
extends MobilePhoneContract
    A concrete MobilePhoneContract.
    There is an extra amount, the preloaded Amount.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field Description
      private float preloadedAmount
      The preloaded amount is the amount of money which can be used in EUR.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      PrePaidCard​(Customer customer, java.lang.String imei, java.lang.String carrier)
      Constructs a prepaid card with specified customer name, imei and carrier name.
      The preloaded amount defaults to 0.0.
      PrePaidCard​(Customer customer, java.lang.String imei, java.lang.String carrier, float preloadedAmount)
      Constructs a prepaid card with specified customer name, imei, carrier name, and a preloaded amount.
      Calls the super constructor.

    • Field Detail

      • preloadedAmount

        private float preloadedAmount
        The preloaded amount is the amount of money which can be used in EUR. Defaults to 0.0, must be ≥0.0.

    • Constructor Detail

      • PrePaidCard

        public PrePaidCard​(Customer customer,
                   java.lang.String imei,
                   java.lang.String carrier,
                   float preloadedAmount)
        Constructs a prepaid card with specified customer name, imei, carrier name, and a preloaded amount.
        Calls the super constructor.
        Parameters:
        customer - the customer of the PrePaidCard to be constructed
        imei - the imei of the PrePaidCard to be constructed
        carrier - the carrier of the PrePaidCard to be constructed
        preloadedAmount - the preloaded amount of the PrePaidCard to be constructed

                   java.lang.String imei,
                   java.lang.String carrier)
        Constructs a prepaid card with specified customer name, imei and carrier name.
        The preloaded amount defaults to 0.0.
        Parameters:
        customer - the customer of the PrePaidCard to be constructed
        imei - the imei of the PrePaidCard to be constructed
        carrier - the carrier of the PrePaidCard to be constructed

    • Method Detail

      • setPreloadedAmount

        private void setPreloadedAmount​(float preloadedAmount)
        Sets the preloaded amount for this prepaid card.
        Invalid arguments are simply ignored and leave the object unchanged.
        Parameters:
        preloadedAmount - the preloaded amount to set

      • unitsLeft

        public int unitsLeft()
        Implements MobilePhoneContract.entities.MobilePhoneContract.unitsLeft.
        The units left is calculated using the used units and the preloaded amount. More precisely, the units left are calculated as "units left" = "preloaded amopunt" / "unit cost" - "used units" One unit costs 0.40 EUR, the smallest possible result is zero (0).
        Specified by:
        unitsLeft in class MobilePhoneContract
        Returns:
        the number of units not used for this contract

      • additionalFee

        public float additionalFee()
        Implements MobilePhoneContract.entities.MobilePhoneContract.additionalFee.
        If there are units left, then the additional fees are 0.0. Otherwise for every used unit, which lack a preloaded amount, 0.40 EUR should be charged as additional fee.
        Specified by:
        additionalFee in class MobilePhoneContract
        Returns:
        the total of any additional fees in EUR.

      • topUp

        public void topUp​(float additionalAmount)
        Add amount (top up) to the prepaid card
        This method tops up the prepaid card with an additional amount. The additional amount has to be a multiple of 5. Invalid arguments are simply ignored.
